short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to open a new search tab and enjoy on every new tab a new amazing helicopter background for your search page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helicopter background photos on every new tab.

The new tab embeds a search bar. Search features are provided by Microsoft Bing.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the LikeABird Backgrounds Chrome extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
